faq.q: Is San Cristóbal safe for travelers?
faq.a: Generally yes in central areas. Use normal city caution at night, keep valuables secure, and prefer trusted taxis.

faq.q: How do I get from Tuxtla airport to San Cristóbal?
faq.a: Most people use shared shuttles (colectivo vans) or private transfers. Shuttles are cheaper; private is faster and direct.
